meanings.definition: In a slanting or oblique direction.
meanings.sent1: She placed the picture frame slantwise on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The sunlight streamed in slantwise through the window.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to walk slantwise across the slippery floor, comically sliding around.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a ray of sunshine, shining slantwise through the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The tree cast a slantwise shadow on the grass, creating a picturesque scene.

meanings.definition: At an angle or diagonal to the horizontal or vertical position.
meanings.sent1: The slantwise roof of the house gave it a unique look.
meanings.sent2: She admired the slantwise lines of the modern architecture.
meanings.sent3: The slantwise stripes on his shirt made him look like a walking zebra.
meanings.sent4: Her slantwise glance hinted at her hidden intentions.
meanings.sent5: The slantwise path up the hill was challenging but rewarding.
